release.action: New IHttpFetcher for making HTTP requests. Multiple instances can now be specified and tried in sequence. This replaces IHttpClientFactory, IHttpDocumentFetcher, and IHttpMetadataFetcher.
New WebDriverHttpFetcher for using popular browsers in headless mode. Ideal for Javascript-driven websites and taking screenshots.
PhantomJSDocumentFetcher now deprecated in favor of WebDriverHttpFetcher.
Now using XML class from Norconex Commons Lang for loading/saving configuration.
User-Agent no longer set directly on crawler config. It can be set on IHttpFetcher implementations that support it.
Dependency updates: Norconex Collector Core 2.0.0, Jetty 9.4.12.v20180830.
Lists are now replacing arrays in most places.
Path is used in addition/instead of File in many places.
Default working directory structure has been improved.
Removed some code deprecated in releases before 3.0.0.
IHttpClientFactory, IHttpDocumentFetcher, and IHttpMetadataFetcher and implementations were removed in favor of IHttpFetcher and GenericHttpFetcher.
Removed "data" package (and its classes) in favor of "reference" package.
Remove all previously available crawl store implementions in favor of new NitriteDataStore.
ISitemapResolverFactory removed in favor of ISitemapResolver.
